es.ucm.fdi.lps.p4.command
Class QuitCommand

java.lang.Object
  es.ucm.fdi.lps.p4.command.Command
      es.ucm.fdi.lps.p4.command.QuitCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class QuitCommand
extends Command

Represents a Help command from the player that ends the game.

  • It uses a command-specific property called "keyword.quitCommand" which default value is "quit".
  • It uses a command-specific property called "keyword.quitCommand.abbrev" which default value is "q".
  • It uses a command-specific property called "keyword.quitCommand.alt" which default value is "exit".
  • It uses a command-specific property called "message.quitCommand.help" which default value is "quit|q|exit".

Constructor Detail

QuitCommand

public QuitCommand(Game game)
Constructs a Quit command (as an specific type of Command) that has access to a given game. Initially the command is unparsed and unexecuted. Default configuration is assumed at this moment.

Parameters:
game - The game.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The argument 'game' cannot be null.

QuitCommand

public QuitCommand(Game game,
                   java.util.Properties config)
Constructs a Quit command (as an specific type of Command) that has access to a given game. Initially the command is unparsed and unexecuted. The properties defined in the given configuration override those of the default configuration.

Parameters:
game - The game.
config - The configuration.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The arguments 'game' and 'config' cannot be null.
